info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 31 at 12:34AM EDT until May 31 at 4:45AM EDT by NWS Mount Holly NJ
info.description:
FFWPHI
The National Weather Service in Mount Holly has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Mercer County in central New Jersey... North Central Burlington County in southern New Jersey... Southeastern Bucks County in southeastern Pennsylvania...
* Until 445 AM EDT.
* At 1234 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 0.5 to 1.5 inches in 1 hour. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets, and underpasses as well as other drainage and low lying areas.
* Some locations that may experience flash flooding include... Trenton, Ewing, Florence, Hightstown, Bordentown, Pennington, Yardley, Newtown, Tullytown, Langhorne, Ivyland and Woodside.
This includes the following streams and drainages... Crafts Creek CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Bacons Run CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Delaware River CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, Millstone River RARITAN, Newtown Creek CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Branch of Pond Run MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, Pleasant Run CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Neshaminy Creek CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Pennypack Creek LOWER DELAWARE, Doctors Creek CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Mill Creek LOWER DELAWARE, Houghs Creek MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, Buck Creek MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, Crosswicks Creek CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Delaware River MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, Queen Anne Creek CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Rocky Brook RARITAN, Stony Brook RARITAN, Woolsey Brook MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, Assiscunk Creek CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, West Branch Shabakunk Creek MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, Duck Pond Run RARITAN, Pidcock Creek MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, Bear Brook RARITAN, Mill Creek CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Southampton Creek LOWER DELAWARE, Shabakunk Creek MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, Barkers Brook CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Little Neshaminy Creek CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Bridegroom Run MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, Rock Run CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Back Creek CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Robin Run CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Edges Brook CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Bear Brook MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, Jacobs Creek MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, RARITAN, Assunpink Creek MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, Martins Creek CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Pond Run MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, Bustleton Creek CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY, Miry Run MIDDLE DELAWARE-MUSCONETCONG, CROSSWICKS-NESHAMINY and Rancocas Creek LOWER DELAWARE.
info.instruction:
Turn around...don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Burlington, NJ; Mercer, NJ; Bucks, PA
